metadata.title: CVE-2015-2934 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.19.24, 1.2x before 1.23.9, and 1.24.x before 1.24.2 doesnot properly handle when the Zend interpreter xml_parse function does notexpand entities, which allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via a crafted SVG file.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
